SamPy.astronomy.datamanipulation.binned_average¶

SamPy.astronomy.datamanipulation.binned_average(xdata, ydata, xbins, step)¶

Calculates a binned average from data

Parameters:
  • xdata – x vector
  • ydata – y vector
  • xbins – a vector of x bins
  • step – size of the step
Returns:

binned average values
